item.description:
Please join us this Tuesday to enjoy a beautiful night of spring frisbee. We'll be meeting at 8PM at the Cambridge Common baseball diamond which is located a couple blocks north of Harvard Square. We generally play from 8-10PM and then go out for food and drinks. Before attending our events, please review our About Us.

We'd recommend you bring a light-colored shirt for visibility's sake and a change of clothes. We supply all of the equipment necessary so there's really nothing else you need to bring besides your smiling face.

Our Organizers pay out of pocket for the frisbees, lanyards, glowsticks, field cones and first aid kits. Please consider bringing a couple bucks or visiting our Amazon Wishlist to support our equipment costs. Our group is free and will always be that way but your optional donations are certainly appreciated!

Here's a link to Cambridge Commons Map. Parking at Cambridge Common's is tricky and we highly recommend you take the MBTA to Harvard Square. If you have any questions about our group, please don't hesitate to contact our Organizers! Cheers!
item.why: We've created an awesome community of fun people who go out of their way to ensure that everyone feels welcomed and included. We also have fantastic games of Ultimate!
item.name: A Beautiful Night for Illuminated Frisbee (Cambridge Commons)
